Text: Write android:layout_below="@id/propertyImg" in listView.  There are many relations in relative layout. Go through the attribute that comes in auto complete.

To achieve this, you need to scrolling the complete layout.  In general case, when you fling on a list view, only the item within the list view moves. 
Check this [link][1].


  [1]: https://github.com/ksoichiro/Android-ObservableScrollView
